segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen, and it's infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's been left on, and water's flooding everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is just standing there, oblivious, drying one stupid plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the water puddleâ€”how can she not feel it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes piled up on the counter like she doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids! Climbing on that rickety stool for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's about to topple over, and she'll never see it coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl egging him on, hand out like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's ruining the cabinets, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window mocks it all with that perfect garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and fix this mess right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like no one pays attention in this house.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this irresponsibility unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's open wide, inviting more trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
